amendment.description: An amendment numbered 408 printed in the Congressional Record to require 10 percent of the funds made available by this Act, for stated Departments and activities, be allocated for assistance in persistent poverty counties.

action.text: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Clyburn amendment (A115). Mr. Frelinghuysen states that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriation bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
